casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Terrell, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Terrell (1995), 72 Ohio St.3d 247.]

(No. 94-2531 Submitted February 21, 1995 Decided May 24, 1995.) *248Stephanie Tubbs Jones, Cuyahoga County Prosecuting Attorney, and Diane Smilanick, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Harry Terrell, pro se. Per Curiam.

The decision of the court of appeals is affirmed for the reasons stated in its opinion.

Judgment affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur.
